title: A great place to kick back and relax! Beautiful neighborhood!
posting_body: ['IMT 6500', 'Located at: 6500 Sepulveda Boulevard Van Nuys, CA 91411', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2 bath | 1125 - 1144 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $3140/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'IMT has closed on a new development project located at 6500 Sepulveda in Van Nuys, CA.', 'This development and construction of a mid-rise apartment community will consist of approximately 160 multifamily apartment homes and sit on 1.22 acres of land.', 'Located in the heart of the San Fernando Valley, IMT 6500 is just minutes from the Sherman Oaks Galleria, 405 Freeway, and the Balboa Recreation Center offering easy access to golf courses, tennis courts, jogging, bike paths and boating on the Balboa Lake.', 'IMT 6500 will also offer an oasis to the city life with luxury interior finishes and desirable common area amenities one can expect at an IMT community.', 'IMT also plans on implementing its professional managing techniques to ensure superior service that has allowed many residents to be proud to call IMT home.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL> or', '<URL>', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '◾
